author: serge
msg: Updated implementation to reflect additions to MailImpl and the new accept method.

author: serge
msg: Added accept(long delay) method to grab only mail objects that are ready to be delivered (effectively hides messages that have a recent failed attempt)

author: serge
msg: Slight documentation updates (does not support concept of Collection of Collection of MailAddress for recipients... hopefully in the next release).

author: serge
msg: Changed bounce method to throw MessagingException (since effectively wraps sendMail methods).  Also added sendMail with just a MimeMessage parameter, and can grab to/from from the mimemessage.
